name: BITS - Supreme Pixel War
description:
The pixels has rebelled and now they want to take over the world, do not let them win! Commands a faction of pixels in a fight to the death! Conquest generators of Bits for useful resources to the cause and destroy the enemy, without mercy!

The world needs you! Will prove yourself to be a true hero ?

Unlock all game modes including Casual, Survival and Hardcore.

Climb the world rankings and become the best commander in BITS!
